content: cc dominant to my changes occur a mild amount of puckering is main color mc this means when you turn the not a big deal and should block out but if you work over the cc will float below the mc to do notice it be sure to loosen your gauge on the this i carry the cc on my left and the mc on my carried yarn or the garment may end up too right you can do this with both yarns in the tight same hand or you can carry one color in each hand one way to ensure that you are carrying your floats nice and loosely is to keep your for more information on colorwork stitches spread out on your needles as you knit dominance see here more information on keeping your gauge can be found here 3 ©2018 alexandria wenninger wee ewe knits 2 0 1 9 1 8 1 7 1 6 1 5 1 4 1 3 1 2 1 1 1 0 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 1 7 1 6 1 5 1 4 1 3 1 2 1 1 1 0 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 m c c c colorwork technique tips
